old:
次の作戦は――こっちでいくか
いやいや、逆にあっちの方が――
new: The next strategy is...shall we go this way... No, the other way around is better...
speaker: Sonel

old:
ボクは、よく独り言を言ってるらしいんだけど
みんなが言うほどの実感がなくってね
new: I often seem to be talking to myself, but I don't really feel it as much as everyone says.
speaker: Sonel

old:
普段から、まわりに誰かいるかとかは
特に気にしてはいないけど
ボクにとっては自然なことさ
new: I usually don't pay much attention to whether someone is around me or not. It's just natural for me.
speaker: Sonel

old: ――これは、独り言じゃないよね？
new: This isn't just talking to myself, right?
speaker: Sonel

old:
展望城に自分の部屋はないのかって？
ああ、それなら以前
一度作ってもらったことがあってね
new:
Lookout Castle, isn't there a room for me there?
Ah, well, it's because I had one made before
speaker: Sonel

old:
でも、城内って広くて複雑でさ
部屋に戻るたびに迷うのに飽きてしまって
気が付いたら場所を忘れてたんだよ
new:
But the castle is so big and complicated.
I got tired of getting lost every time I went back to my room and realized I'd forgotten where I was.
speaker: Sonel

old:
今覚えてる場所は――
城の入り口と、王宮層と
あとはシチューのある食堂だけさ！
new:
The only places I remember now are--
the castle entrance, the royal layer,
and the cafeteria with the stew!
speaker: Sonel

old: ボクは、作戦というものは"生き物"だと思ってる
new: I think that a strategy is like a living creature.
speaker: Sonel

old:
いくら事前に完璧に計画したつもりでも
その場の状況でいくらだって変わるし
思い通りに行く方が珍しいくらいさ
new: No matter how perfectly you plan it in advance, it can change at any moment, and it's rare that things go the way you want them to.
speaker: Sonel

old:
まぁ、そこが面白いところなんだけどね
何でも思った通りになるなんて
つまんないだろ？
new: Well, that's the interesting part about it, you know? It's boring for everything to just go as you think.
speaker: Sonel

old: 準備はいいかい？それじゃ行こう
new: Are you ready? Let's go.
speaker: Sonel

old: 準備はいいかい？　それじゃ行こう
new: Are you ready?　Let's go.
speaker: Sonel

old: きっと、何かあるはずさ
new: There must be something for sure.
speaker: Sonel

old: きっと、何かあるはずさ
new: There must be something for sure.
speaker: Sonel

old: ふんふん、なるほどね
new: Hmmm... I see.
speaker: Sonel

old: いや、待てよ？
new: No, wait, could you?
speaker: Sonel

old: いや、待てよ？
new: No, wait, could you?
speaker: Sonel

old:
そうか！　そういうことか！
やはり僕は、天才だね！
new: Ah, I see! So that's how it is! As I thought, I am a genius!
speaker: Sonel

old:
おかしいなぁ――
今日はちょっと調子が悪いらしい！
new: Hmm, that's strange... It seems like I'm feeling a little unwell today!
speaker: Sonel

old:
おかしいなぁ――
今日はちょっと調子が悪いらしい！
new: Hmm, that's strange... It seems like I'm feeling a little unwell today!
speaker: Sonel

old: ほら、僕の思った通りだろう？
new: See, it's just as I thought, isn't it?
speaker: Sonel

old:
はっはっは！
たまにはこんなこともあるさ！
new: Hahaha! Sometimes things like this happen!
speaker: Sonel

old:
はっはっは！
たまにはこんなこともあるさ！
new: Hahaha! Sometimes things like this happen!
speaker: Sonel

old: あー、キミキミ
new: Oh, you, you.
speaker: Sonel

old: あー、キミキミ
new: Oh, you, you.
speaker: Sonel

old: ちょっといいかな？　隊長
new: Can I have a word with you?　Captain.
speaker: Sonel

old: ちょっといいかな？　隊長
new: Can I have a word with you?　Captain.
speaker: Sonel

old: おかしいなぁ――
new: Hmm, something is strange.
speaker: Sonel

old: やはり僕は、天才だね！
new: I am a genius, after all!
speaker: Sonel

old: それじゃあ行こう！
new: Let's go then!
speaker: Sonel

old: ここにはもう何もなさそうだ
new: There doesn't seem to be anything here anymore.
speaker: Sonel

old: さて、帰るとしよう！
new: Now, let's go home!
speaker: Sonel

old: ああ、もう――だめだ――
new: Oh, no—it's no use—
speaker: Sonel

old: アハハハ！
new: Ahahaha!
speaker: Sonel

old: アハハハ！
new: Ahahaha!
speaker: Sonel

old: んんっ！？
new: Huh?!
speaker: Sonel

old: んんっ！？
new: Huh?!
speaker: Sonel

old: えぇっと――
new: Um...
speaker: Sonel

old: はぁ～
new: Ha～
speaker: Sonel

old: はぁ～
new: Ha～
speaker: Sonel

old: あれ――
new: That—
speaker: Sonel

old:
ここにはもう何もなさそうだ
僕の勘がそう囁いているのでね
さて、帰るとしよう！
new: There doesn't seem to be anything else here. That's what my instincts are whispering to me, you know. Well, let's go home!
speaker: Sonel

old:
やったね！
僕らがいれば敵無しなんじゃないか！？
new: Great job! If we're together, we have no enemies, don't we?!
speaker: Sonel

old:
あー、ごめん
今ちょっと考えなきゃいけないことが
あってね、忙しいんだ
new: Oh, sorry. There's something I need to think about right now. I'm busy.
speaker: Sonel

old:
ありがとう！　助かったよ！
よしよしこれで――
new: Thank you! I'm saved! Good job—
speaker: Sonel

old:
もう終わったの？
さすが、頼りになるね！
new: Is it already over? As expected, you're dependable!
speaker: Sonel

old: さて、何をする？
new: Now, what to do?
speaker: Sonel

old: さて、何をする？
new: Now, what to do?
speaker: Sonel

old: やあ
new: Hey
speaker: Sonel

old: やあ
new: Hey
speaker: Sonel

old: よく来たね
new: Nice to see you
speaker: Sonel

old: よく来たね
new: Nice to see you
speaker: Sonel

old: はあはあ、久しぶりの戦は体に応えるなぁ
new: Ha ha! It's been a while since the last battle, it's taking a toll on my body
speaker: Sonel

old: ちょっと待った、少し休憩させてくれ
new: Wait a moment, please let me take a short break.
speaker: Sonel

old: あれ、体が重いぞ、こんなはずじゃあ
new: Oh, my body feels heavy. This is not how it should be.
speaker: Sonel

old: や、やっぱり僕は室内で策を練ってる方が――
new: I think I'd rather be indoors, planning...
speaker: Sonel

old: 少しは、動けるようになってきたぞ――
new: I've become a little more mobile.
speaker: Sonel

old: ああ、でもまだ苦しい、ちょっと休憩
new: Ah, but I'm still hurting, I need a little break.
speaker: Sonel

old: キミから見て、今の僕ってどうかな？
new: How do I look now from your point of view?
speaker: Sonel

old: もうちょっと頑張れそうな気も――ううん
new: I think I can do a little more -- no.
speaker: Sonel

old: あははは、どうだい僕の動き、軽やかだろう？
new: Ha-ha-ha, how's my movement, light, isn't it?
speaker: Sonel

old: 風のように走り、雷のように刺す！
new: Running like the wind, piercing like thunder!
speaker: Sonel

old: なに、前はちょっと腕が鈍ってただけさ！
new: No, I was just a little rusty before!
speaker: Sonel

old: ふふ、戦える参謀官っていいよね
new: Hehe, having a capable staff officer who can fight is nice, isn't it?
speaker: Sonel

old: え、見つかった！？
new: Wait, it was found!?
speaker: Sonel

old: さすが隊長だ！
new: As expected, Captain!
speaker: Sonel
